messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Cool Clown Clan (CCC). All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Do not harm any clowns or mimes if you do it is classed as a  high punishment crime and can lead to public excecution

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Server Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: spess suits.
